name: Litter Locator
description:
Litter Locator is a simple game where you must find and accuse litterers who roam the docks. This game was made for #TeamSeas, in hope to raise awareness for the massive amounts of trash littered throughout oceans and rivers.

Controls:

-WASD to move

-Space to switch telescope zoom

-Click to Accuse

Game by BenBonk

Music by???

https://teamseas.org/
